General.Name: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited
General.Description: Intermedical Care and Lab Hospital Public Company Limited operates a network of private hospitals. The company offers annual health check, health check before work, health check for work permit, vaccination, and general medical examination services, as well as academic training services. It also provides environment analysis services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

2.Name: Ms. Ratchaneeporn  Mokkarawut
2.Title: Exec. Director, CFO & Acting Account Mang.
